name: Roofing - Opening
data: We're actually checking homeowner's roof with no cost, it's a free inspection and we're done with some of your neighbors (lead)
We're from (Buyer's name) and we've been in the community for over (years in the script) and we're giving back to the community by giving them a free inspection of the roof.

Some of your neighbor's we have found damage and leaks already so what we did sir/ma'am is we give them a free consultation on what to do especially those who have potential for molds and it's a no cost inspection.
